After updating the script, delete old error definition file (aztec_error_definitions.json or error_definitions.json) in the script root directory and download new with Option 24. Also delete the old agent (option 3) and create a new agent (option 2).
NOTICE: After updating the script, delete old error definition file (aztec_error_definitions.json or error_definitions.json) in the script root directory and download new with Option 24. Also delete the old agent (option 3) and create a new agent (option 2).

Correct keyType for BLS private keys
NOTICE: After updating the script, uninstall and install the aztec node or manually change the keyType from BN254 to BLS in all bls_validator_N.yml files located at ./aztec/keys/. Then restart the web3signer container.
